level.text: With the exception of ยง 1506.1, there shall be no closed season for angling.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 34 DCR 2028, 2031 (March 27, 1987); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 5850 (August 4, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 D.C. Reg. 3361 (May 12, 2000).
